nodes.text: R2-D2 is LOST! is the second volume in the Droid Tales picture-book series. It was written by Caitlin Kennedy and published by Disney–Lucasfilm Press on February 11, 2020.

The droids are in for an Endor-able adventure! While C-3PO is pleased to once again be treated like a god by the Ewoks, and BB-8 is curious about his new furry companions, R2-D2 finds himself in a camping experience gone wrong when he comes across a small Ewok in need of help. With charming illustrations by Brian Kesinger, this next installment of the fun new Droid Tales picture book series is a delightful addition to any youngling's growing library.

Sometime during the Cold War, the droids C-3PO, R2-D2, and BB-8 arrived on the forest moon of Endor. Once there, the trio was met by the local Ewok tribe, who throw a celebration in honor of the protocol droid.
R2 chooses to venture off, where he finds a lost Ewok child in the forest. The pair has an adventure overnight before making their way back.
